content: I found this conversation today. I have read the contributing guide and can't figure out how to to get a changelog-* label attached. I see above you say put it in a comment, but it's a git commit message. What is the comment syntax? # changelog-foo? And does it matter where in the body it goes?

(@Sean McLaughlin I moved your message here)

What you do is you create a PR comment from within the github interface, where one of the lines is a changelog-... label that you want.
